author: Primal Space
description:
Try out Odoo and get your first app for free at https://www.odoo.com/r/cHv

Have you ever wondered how one man with no spy training managed to fool Hitler, reshape the course of World War II, and become the most successful double agent in history? In this video, we reveal the incredible true story of Juan Pujol García, codenamed “Garbo,” the Spanish double agent who built a fake network of spies and tricked the Nazis into believing the D-Day landings in Normandy were simply a diversion. Stay to the end to learn more about this deception and how Juan Pujol Garcia tricked the Nazis.

Short on time? Feel free to skip ahead in this video using the chapter links below.

00:00 The Spy That Tricked The Nazis
00:58 Who Was Juan Pujol Garcia?
02:26 Building a Network of Spies
04:50 Moving the Troops
07:43 The D-Day Landings at Normandy

Thanks for watching this Primal Space video. If you enjoyed it, let me know in the comments below, and don't forget to subscribe so you can see more videos lik
title: The Spy That Tricked The Nazis
